name: Mainichi Nekoyoubi
overview: Mainichi Neko Youbi is a simulation game you can choose from ten differents cat's breeds, you can see it grow and if you have a couple of cats you can even have kittens. The player can buy the cat toys, different meals, fishes or milk, etc. The player can wash the cat, take it to the veterinarian or even to a Cat contest. The game features a complete encyclopedia in japanese about the different cat breeds.
